text: "Hot in Herre" is a 2002 hip hop song by American rapper Nelly. The song was the first single from his second album Nellyville. The song was released on May 7, 2002. It is very popular. It reached #1 on the Canadian Singles Chart, the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and the U.S. Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip Hop Songs. Category:Nelly songs Category:2002 songs Category:Hip hop songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Hot in Herre
